name: UpdatePropertyDefinitions
description:
Update property definitions for a specific project.

Call this tool to update the property definitions of a specified project in your Datadog account.

parameters.name: property_definition_id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying the specific property definition to update.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this property definition.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID to access specific project details in Datadog. Call /api/projects/ to find it.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: property_attributes
parameters.description: A JSON object with updated property details, including ID, name, type, and tags.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this property definition.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this property definition.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
